attributes.action: Suspend Coucil Tax fees for 3 months amid COVID-19 to ease the financial burden
attributes.additional_details:
Suspend council tax fees for a minimum of 3 months to ease the financial burden on the population in these uncertain times. 

Especially as recycling and refuse collections are now slowly stopping.
attributes.background: As alot of the population are suffering financially due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the government should suspend council tax for atleast 3 months to ease the burden in these uncertain times. Mortgage companies have already started doing this to help.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
